# Write the stream to a delta table

# sink table and checkpoint locations
delta_stream_table_path = 'abfss://hallinc@hallincdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/delta/iotdevicetable/'
checkpointpath = 'abfss://hallinc@hallincdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/delta/checkpoint/'

# stream to sink
deltastream = iotstream.writeStream \
    .format("delta") \
    .option("checkpointLocation", checkpointpath) \
    .start(delta_stream_table_path)
print("Streaming to delta sink...")

# Read the data in delta format into a dataframe

df = spark.read \
    .format("delta") \
    .load(delta_stream_table_path)
display(df.count())

# create catalog table based on the sink

spark.sql("CREATE TABLE IotDeviceData USING DELTA LOCATION '{0}'".format(delta_stream_table_path))
